lyrics:
12 contributorsdanger zone lyricsverse 1
i cant imagine how hard it must be to be you
adopting all your history its hard being me too
are your secrets where you left them
cause now your ghosts are mine as well
i think its time i met them and i think its time you tell
and you should have told me when you met me all these things i should know
and i should have asked we should have talked about this so long ago

prechorus
its not fair its not fair you dont need me here
oh hows this happening to me it feels so lonely here

chorus
we are in a mess a danger zone a danger zone
what will happen next you never know
we are in a mess a danger zone a danger zone
what will happen next you never know

verse 2
now we share the closet now youve let me come inside
and now youre finally undressing and i feel like i might die
the damage is infectious the confession is too late
and how can i accept this how is this happening to me

prechorus
its not fair its not fair help me come up for air
oh hows this happening to me it feels so lonely here
see gwen stefani liveget tickets as low as 119you might also likechorus
we are in a mess a danger zone a danger zone
what will happen next you never know
we are in a mess a danger zone a danger zone
what will happen next you never know
you never know you never know
you never know

spoken interlude
all your secrets
all your lies
all of it

chorus
we are in a mess a danger zone a danger zone
what will happen next you never know
im completely paralyzed

this is the last time

we are in a mess a danger zone a danger zone
